item.title: CVE-2024-6378|2024-08-20T13:45:10.521Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- enovia%20collaborative%20industry%20innovator
item.description: A reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability affecting ENOVIA Collaborative Industry Innovator from Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2022x through Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2024x allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in user's browser session.
